bioconda.name: bioconductor-trigger
bioconda.summary: Transcriptional Regulatory Inference from Genetics of Gene ExpRession

biotools.summary: This R package provides tools for the statistical analysis of integrative genomic data that involve some combination of genotypes and traits. They allow to construct global linkage maps between genetic markers and gene expression, analyze multiple-locus linkage for gene expression, quantify the proportion of GW variation explained by each locus and identify eQTL hotspots, estimate pair-wise causal gene regulatory probabilities and construct gene regulatory networks.
